panels.description: Displays the total number of API requests over time, grouped by path and method.
panels.title: Total HTTP Requests (Range)

panels.description: Total number of HTTP requests received since startup of the instance.
panels.title: Total Requests

panels.description: Shows total 4xx/5xx errors from the instance startup
panels.title: 4xx or 5xx Responses (Total)

panels.description: Displays the total number of requests counted during the selected time range.
panels.title: Total Requests Over Time Range

panels.description: Shows total 4xx/5xx errors within the Grafana-selected time range
panels.title: 4xx or 5xx Responses Over Time Range

panels.description: Displays the number of client (4xx) and server (5xx) errors together over time, grouped by path, method, and status code.
panels.title: 4xx & 5xx Errors (Range)

panels.description: Shows the average response time for API requests, grouped by method, path, and status.
panels.title: Average Response Time

panels.description: Displays the 95th percentile of the request duration for the URL shortener API Gateway over the selected time range. This metric helps to monitor the latency of API requests, highlighting the upper end of the response time distribution.
panels.title: p95 Percentile
